title: What do you guys think of dating ladies that are esports fan/moba player

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
In the western world the phrase gamer grill, is associated with ewww, or EWWW WTF, eww siren. But in Asia that is not the case, In Asia moba especially the ones on phone is quite popular with girls. Well for girls who do not value education or have the integrity to work like a normal person and who enjoy shopping very much.

Only a few months ago I dated a young lady about ten years younger than me, she's in her early twenties I'm in my early thirties. One of the problem dating her I remember I had something important to discuss with her this was back at her apartment. She continue to watch esports telling me how stupid a player is(I have no idea what she is watching)

When I talked more she actually put her arm around my head gripping me under her shoulder. Just a piece of my mind I wanted to share. I don't know what to think of gamer Asian girls even now.


https://preview.ibb.co/htSZnA/23423432432.png[/img][/url]

I gave her a small parting gift
